mapper.update: update day_global as d set dayDefCnt = (select * from (select t.defCnt - y.defCnt from day_global y inner join day_global t using (nationName) where t.stdDay = (select current_date) and y.stdDay = (select current_date - interval 1 day) and d.nationName = t.nationName and d.stdDay = t.stdDay ) as tmp ) ,dayDeathCnt = (select * from (select t.deathCnt - y.deathCnt from day_global y inner join day_global t using (nationName) where d.nationName = t.nationName and t.stdDay = (select current_date) and y.stdDay = (select current_date - interval 1 day) and d.stdDay = t.stdDay ) as tmp2 ) where stdDay = (select current_date);
mapper.insert: insert into total_global (stdDay, defCnt, deathCnt, daydefcnt, daydeathCnt) values ( (select current_date()), (select sum(defCnt) from day_global where stdDay = (select current_date())), (select sum(deathCnt) from day_global where stdDay = (select current_date())), (select sum(today.defCnt)-sum(yester.defCnt) from day_global yester join day_global today using (nationName) where yester.stdDay = (select current_date() - interval 1 day) and today.stdDay = (select current_date()) ), (select sum(today.deathCnt)-sum(yester.deathCnt) from day_global yester join day_global today using (nationName) where yester.stdDay = (select current_date() - interval 1 day) and today.stdDay = (select current_date()) ));
mapper.select: select * from day_global order by stdDay desc, dayDefCnt desc limit 189;
